lines.text: I'm respectful of any man who's got enough liquor to make him kill.
Seems to me I've heard something like that about you, Kallen.
That's the reason you're going back to stand trial, Kallen. Because of me, you understand? Because of me!

I've never been a success at anything I tried to do. Anything I ever tried to do ever, failed. I've been a failure and that's all, a plain old failure. But I'm not going to be this time. I'm going to make this one. I'm going to do this right!
There are two lives here. The man who is in your hands and the girl who is in mine. We both serve the same law.

[referring to his friends]
They don't want me to go. If I say the word, they'll kill you.
You going to say the word?
I can do my own killin'.
You want to get us some wood for the fire?
